descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
🏅 Train Like an Olympian

Step into a lifelike Olympic 10m pistol arena right from your room, school, or training center. No travel. No expensive gear. Just pure focus, discipline, and practice.

👥 Room-Based Multiplayer
Create your own match room and invite your friends to join you for a 10m air pistol. Shoot together in real time, compare scores instantly, and enjoy a friendly, competitive Olympic-style experience.

🌍 Built for Everyone

From aspiring athletes in small towns to professionals aiming for the big stage, SportyXR makes world-class training accessible and affordable.


shooting skills.
